author: National Bureau
text:
The Congress on Tuesday came out in support of the Supreme Court’s decision. “I am happy that an error is being corrected. This is only the first step. I look forward to the day when the Supreme Court will uphold the Delhi HC judgment,” senior Congress leader P. Chidambaram said.

Two BJP spokespersons The Hindu spoke to refused to comment. “I don’t think it would be correct to speak about the merits of the case because now the matter is before the SC,” BJP spokesperson Nalin Kohli was quoted as saying.
title: Congress backs move, BJP mum
